awasanaye pradeshawasinge da dayakathwaya athiwa pana yana sakakaruwan athadanguwata path wiya.rajya aarakshaka niladhariyaku lesath wareka polis parikshakawarayek lesath upa polis parikshaka warayaku lesath hasirunu pudgalaya kalak polisiye upa polis parikshakawarayaku lesa sewaya kara pasuwa sewayen iwath karana lada galenbidunu wawa pradeshaye padinchikaruweki.anek pudgalayin athara nawika hamudawa haragiya galla, bataduwa padinchikaruwekda, piliyandala bokundara padinchi sancharaka gaman maga penwannek da, migamuwa, diwulapitiya pradeshaye padinchi prasiddha malala kridakayek da wuha.wahana kuliyata sapayana aayathanayakin me sandaha wan rathayak labagena thibu athara mita pera wathawe di motar rathayak labagana pamini bawada pawase’me wanawita kagalla pradeshaye mema pudgalayinta wiruddhawa paminili 4k labi thibena athara diwayine anekuth pradeshawalin labunu paminili rashiyak sandaha mowun awashyawa siti sakakaruwan bawada pawase.athadanguwata gath sakakaruwan pasugiya (29) da mawanalla mahesthrath idiriyata pamina wu athara idiri dinaka handunaganime perattuwakata idiripath kirima sandaha mowun rakshitha bandhanagara gatha kirimata da niyama kara thibuni.mama hadisi watalima kagalla kottasa polis adhikari pi්rayalal dasanayaka mahathage paudgalika adhikshanaya yatathe sahakara polis adhikari pradip kalupahana mahathage pradhanathwayen hemmathagama polis sthanadhipathi polis parikshaka dhammika kandewaththa, po. pa. kumarasinha, u.po.pa ranasinha, u. po. pa. dasanayaka, po. sa. 56265 senewirathna, po. sa. 24274 palitha, po. ko. 27172 bandara, po. sa. 45513 bandula, po. ko. 32345 senarathna, po. ko. 34249 bandara yana niladharin wisin sidukara thibuni..
